Nov. 23, 1986 D Rochdale Youth Entertainment Contest
Rochdale Youth Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
rochdale-youth-entertainment-contest
None
Rochdale Town Hall, Rochdale, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes 1st £170, 2nd £11, 3rd £80.
Best soloist Steven Stockwell (euphonium) Horbury. Best hymn tune - Besses Boys. 8th annual contest 9 bands competed.
Nov. 23, 2012, 2:07 p.m. Dec. 10, 2014, 3:20 p.m.
